name: The grand door
description:
Description:

You woke up in an old Egyptian temple, in front of a huge mysterious door, what awaits you ahead? Let's find a way to open it!

Features:
12 levels to explore and complete
5 Well-developed enemies and other elements of the environment
Nice 2d Egyptian-style graphics
Surprises and Secrets
Nice egyptian music
Unexpectedly funny situations

Keyboard control:
Move Left / Right - AD
Staircases - WS
Using Switches - E
Throw - Q
Jump - SPACE
Open / Close the main menu - Esc

Gamepad control (xBox 360):
Move Left / Right - Left Stick (Left / Right)
Climbing stairs - Left stick (up / down)
Using Switches - Y
Boss - B
Jump - A
Open / Close the main menu - BACK

The authors of the game:
Serious07 - Code, sounds, organization
Akagane - Art and Level Design
Arthur_Yul - Musical accompaniment
Madness_Shadow, Kosk - Testing the game

This game was developed in 7 days as a part of the Community Game Jam.

Theme: The game is a lier.

Follow my twitter if you like our game!

Tip: The version for Windows is more stable and faster, use it if possible!
